text: Selena Gomez is spending some time in the land Down Under. The 25 - year - old “ Wolves ” singer was spotted arriving at Sydney Airport in Sydney, Australia on Monday. Even after her long flight, Gomez looked chic. She wore white sweatpants, a white shirt and a jean jacket. She also accessorized her look with a cap and sunglasses, as well as a pair silver hoop earrings and white sneakers. In addition to bringing her travel fashion A - game, the singer brought a black ukulele. Gomez didn ’ t waste anytime enjoying some fun in the sun.
